citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_66b4d93d-7094-4002-845e-b3ec08f3121c\", \"author\": [{\"given\": \"Seth\", \"family\": \"Danielson\"}, {\"given\": \"Hank\", \"family\": \"Statscewich\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2022\", \"04\", \"27\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Le Fairbanks College of Fisheries and Ocean Science de l'Universit\u00e9 de l'Alaska a d\u00e9ploy\u00e9 un planeur sous-marin autonome d\u00e9ploy\u00e9 pr\u00e8s de Seward Alaska pour mesurer les propri\u00e9t\u00e9s physiques de l'eau. Ceux-ci comprennent la temp\u00e9rature, la profondeur, la conductivit\u00e9, la salinit\u00e9, l'oxyg\u00e8ne dissous, la fluorom\u00e9trie, l'irradiance, la chlorphylle et le cdom.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"AOOS Glider Observatory\", \"title\": \"Donn\u00e9es hydrographiques de planeur provenant du d\u00e9ploiement de Fairbanks \u00e0 l'Universit\u00e9 de l'Alaska pendant l'exp\u00e9dition panpacifique en haute mer 2022 de l'Ann\u00e9e internationale du saumon\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"https://iys.hakai.org/dataset/ca-cioos_66b4d93d-7094-4002-845e-b3ec08f3121c?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_66b4d93d-7094-4002-845e-b3ec08f3121c\", \"author\": [{\"given\": \"Seth\", \"family\": \"Danielson\"}, {\"given\": \"Hank\", \"family\": \"Statscewich\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2022\", \"04\", \"27\"]}], \"abstract\": \"The University of Alaska Fairbanks College of Fisheries and Ocean Science deployed an autonomous underwater glider deployed near Seward Alaska to measure physical water properties. These include temperature, depth, conductivity, salinity, dissolved oxygen, fluorometry, irradiance, chlorphpyll, and cdom.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"AOOS Glider Observatory\", \"title\": \"Glider Hydrographic Data from the University of Alaska Fairbanks Deployment During the 2022 International Year of the Salmon Pan-Pacific High Seas Expedition\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"https://iys.hakai.org/dataset/ca-cioos_66b4d93d-7094-4002-845e-b3ec08f3121c?local=en\"}]

      <mri:abstract xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">
        <gco:CharacterString>The University of Alaska Fairbanks College of Fisheries and Ocean Science deployed an autonomous underwater glider deployed near Seward Alaska to measure physical water properties. These include temperature, depth, conductivity, salinity, dissolved oxygen, fluorometry, irradiance, chlorphpyll, and cdom.</gco:CharacterString>
        <lan:PT_FreeText>
          <lan:textGroup>
            <lan:LocalisedCharacterString locale="#fr">Le Fairbanks College of Fisheries and Ocean Science de l'Université de l'Alaska a déployé un planeur sous-marin autonome déployé près de Seward Alaska pour mesurer les propriétés physiques de l'eau. Ceux-ci comprennent la température, la profondeur, la conductivité, la salinité, l'oxygène dissous, la fluorométrie, l'irradiance, la chlorphylle et le cdom.</lan:LocalisedCharacterString>
          </lan:textGroup>
        </lan:PT_FreeText>
      </mri:abstract>

name: ca-cioos_66b4d93d-7094-4002-845e-b3ec08f3121c1
notes: The University of Alaska Fairbanks College of Fisheries and Ocean Science deployed an autonomous underwater glider deployed near Seward Alaska to measure physical water properties. These include temperature, depth, conductivity, salinity, dissolved oxygen, fluorometry, irradiance, chlorphpyll, and cdom.

notes_translated.en: The University of Alaska Fairbanks College of Fisheries and Ocean Science deployed an autonomous underwater glider deployed near Seward Alaska to measure physical water properties. These include temperature, depth, conductivity, salinity, dissolved oxygen, fluorometry, irradiance, chlorphpyll, and cdom.
notes_translated.fr: Le Fairbanks College of Fisheries and Ocean Science de l'Université de l'Alaska a déployé un planeur sous-marin autonome déployé près de Seward Alaska pour mesurer les propriétés physiques de l'eau. Ceux-ci comprennent la température, la profondeur, la conductivité, la salinité, l'oxygène dissous, la fluorométrie, l'irradiance, la chlorphylle et le cdom.

description_translated.en: The Canadian Integrated Ocean Observing System (CIOOS) Pacific is the regional hub of the National CIOOS for ocean data aggregation on Canada’s west coast.
description_translated.fr: Le Système intégré d’observation des océans canadien (SIOOC) Pacifique est la plaque tournante régionale du SIOOC national pour l’agrégation des données océaniques sur la côte ouest du Canada.

title: Glider Hydrographic Data from the University of Alaska Fairbanks Deployment During the 2022 International Year of the Salmon Pan-Pacific High Seas Expedition

title_translated.fr: Données hydrographiques de planeur provenant du déploiement de Fairbanks à l'Université de l'Alaska pendant l'expédition panpacifique en haute mer 2022 de l'Année internationale du saumon
